topic.title: Try to create a GROUP
topic.body: I cloned this site, but as admin I can not create a GROUP. So I would like try here.

topic.title: Need 0.1 namecoin to resolve my .bit domain
topic.body:
If someone can send 0.1 NMC to `N75zrxNyHQQTFDo4w2afix1d7raSaSo65P`, I will 
appreciate!

topic.title: Cannot resolve my .bit domain
How can I watch Joker 2019 Movie?
topic.body:
`Joker` is a `R-rated`  film, so I may not watch this in my country's cinema. How could I watch Joker online?
By google I get some phishing sites, told me to register and require my credit card.

1568982640_1D9mg5Mzk96FBLEkjCxabcydfY4Bb.body:
> [randomshits](#comment_129_1CuFETj5LtyEduzaoAcdv9sMAQtYRqjqDY): I sent you 0.03 NMC to the address you specified which is enough to register a domain. You're welcome.

thanks so much!!!

1569073039_1D9mg5Mzk96FBLEkjCxabcydfY4Bb.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_1076_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): It can take a while till ZeroName is updated. You might have to wait for a day or so. [...]

Thanks, I get my .yu domain on `NameYo`, but I found that it seems `Name.YO domain resolver` Plugin is necessary for using `.yo` domain. After I disabled this plugin, I can't visit my site by .yu domain. I think it suggests that my visitors who visit without `Name.YO domain resolver` Plugin can not visit my site by `.yo` domain, too...

1568753767_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body: ZeroNet can help me cast off GFW's control, I am from China, you know
